# vectors

Consider the following vectors:

```{r}
#| echo: TRUE
#| eval: FALSE
a <- 17
b <- 6
```

Use the elementary arithmetic operators +, -, *, /, and ˆ to:

- a) add a and b
- b) subtract b from a
- c) multiply a by b
- d) divide a by b
- e) raise a to the power of b

- b) subtract b from a

- e) raise a to the power of b
